file_content.text: Walls cannot hold me! I will join him! He calls me!
Are you his? Do you come to cut these chains?
Yeah. I'm his. That's right. Where are we supposed to go again?
I work with Ivory.
The cells... are they empty? Is the team complete?
He said after... there is a door. An escape. A stairway to the stars. Oh-oh-oh!
Tell me where Ivory is, and I'll set you free.
I can help you.
Why do you come here? You want this body? Do you dream of touching it!
Where is Ivory? What's his plan?
Talk if you want to live.
Gone! Gone! If Ivory left me, I am dead!
He lives! He will leave this world! No one can stop him. He will rule the stars!
I should be with them. The cells, they open! The team is complete. Oh-oh-oh!
This is a restricted area! Step away from the prisoner.
Marshall Cavarat sent me to interrogate her.
I'm authorized.
I'm just asking her some questions....
I'm not doing anything wrong.
Stop waving that thing around unless you want me to be short an arm.
Back off.
You were right. Positive ID on the captain. Experiment chamber 21.
Why do I get the feeling he's not on our side?
That didn't sound good.
Look out!
This is no man of the Republic.
Is there some reason the Republic would be hunting you, Captain?
I'll hold her.
I'll hold him.
Thank you, officer.
Did you think Rogun would let you interfere again?
Join the party. You're just in time for cake.
The more, the merrier....
You're one of Rogun's? I thought only Republic bigwigs knew about this place.
How did you get in here?
You think Rogun has no friends in the Republic?
What in blazes are you?
I am Rogun's vengeance.
That's Dust, Rogun's best assassin. They say he's been killed a dozen times and always comes back.
Rogun has counted the years until he meets again with Ivory. It is his reward for all he has done.
And he will not let you stop him.
Oh-oh-oh!
